name: Arrow Shooter 2.0
description: this is a little arrow shooter game that I created the point of this game is you trying to hit the fruit above the human but be careful!! if you hurt the human you will restart the level your objective is to aim at the apple the longer you hold onto the screen the faster your arrow will go there are currently 10 levels in the game if you beat all the 10 levels message me on instagram @bruh_habib1 I couldnt event beat the final level of my own game Thank You And I Hope You Enjoy!!!
